definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Thus a controversy has arisen inside China between those who favour continuing the war and those who favour making peace.
sentences.chinese: 在中國內部，因而就掀起了主戰派和主和派之爭。
